put.summary: Create or clone a new subvolume
put.desc: Creates a subvolume in the path or clones the subvolume mentioned in the parentPath

params.name: body
params.desc: Subvolume object supplied in the body of the operation.

202.desc: Accepted -- Create request accepted; operation will complete asynchronously

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.desc: Returns a list of the subvolumes in the volume

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.
